channel.title: RP2040 on neon.Golem
channel.description: Recent content in RP2040 on neon.Golem

item.title: volt.OS
item.description: The firmware for the power supply is going to be fairly complex in the sense that I have a lot of features on the board. The main issue is the user addressable IO and ADC pin. A custom interpreter is the way to go here, but I have no good idea on how to even approach this.
